Apple___Apple_scab.solution: Remove and destroy infected leaves. Apply fungicides like mancozeb or captan during early spring.

Apple___Black_rot.solution: Prune and destroy infected branches. Use fungicides containing thiophanate-methyl or myclobutanil.

Apple___Cedar_apple_rust.solution: Remove nearby cedar trees if possible. Use fungicides like chlorothalonil or myclobutanil during early growth.

Apple___healthy.solution: No action needed. Keep monitoring regularly.

Background_without_leaves.solution: No plant leaf detected. Please upload a valid leaf image.

Blueberry___healthy.solution: No action needed. Your plant is in good health!

Cherry___healthy.solution: No action needed. Keep an eye on the plant regularly.

Cherry___Powdery_mildew.solution: Apply sulfur or potassium bicarbonate sprays. Improve air circulation and avoid overhead watering.

Corn___Cercospora_leaf_spot Gray_leaf_sp.solution: Rotate crops and use resistant hybrids. Apply fungicides like azoxystrobin if necessary.

Corn___Common_rust.solution: Use resistant varieties. Apply fungicides like pyraclostrobin if infection is severe.

Corn___healthy.solution: No action needed. Keep monitoring for any changes.

Corn___Northern_Leaf_Blight.solution: Use resistant hybrids and apply fungicides such as propiconazole at early symptoms.

Grape___Black_rot.solution: Prune infected vines. Use fungicides such as myclobutanil or mancozeb during growing season.

Grape___Esca_(Black_Measles).solution: Remove infected wood and apply trunk protectants. Avoid pruning in wet conditions.

Grape___healthy.solution: No treatment needed. Your plant looks great!

Grape___Leaf_blight_(Isariopsis_Leaf_Spo.solution: Remove infected leaves. Apply copper-based fungicides or myclobutanil during early season.

Orange___Haunglongbing_(Citrus_greening).solution: No cure exists. Remove and destroy infected trees to prevent spreading. Control psyllid insects with insecticides.

Peach___Bacterial_spot.solution: Use copper-based bactericides. Choose resistant cultivars and prune for better airflow.

Peach___healthy.solution: No action needed. Keep observing the plant for early signs of disease.

Pepper,_bell___Bacterial_spot.solution: Apply copper sprays. Avoid overhead watering and rotate crops to prevent recurrence.

Pepper,_bell___healthy.solution: No treatment needed. Maintain regular care and monitoring.

Potato___Early_blight.solution: Apply fungicides such as chlorothalonil or mancozeb. Rotate crops yearly and remove infected debris.

Potato___healthy.solution: No action required. Plant is healthy!
